text: Does anyone know, How can i add HubSpot form entries into Hubdb table with API ?

Hi,
Is it possible to create a deal and associate it with a contact in the same request?

Hi folks
probably asked already but could not find it :slightly_smiling_face:, is there something similar for `POST /contacts/v1/contact/createOrUpdate/email/:contact_email` in the V3 Version? Thx

<@U01E6Q1958A> - so out of curiosity, how is HubSpot able to internally build lists of people who registered or attended an event? For instance I'm using the EventBrite integration and I can build lists of members with specific statuses...
which api is that a part of? maybe the answer is <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/marketing/marketing-emails|here>?
I’m trying to create a new “events” object and then a “registration” object to join contacts to events. It looks like associated objects is a required field in the API.
So… how do I create the event object with NO associations so I create the registration object to connect contacts and events?
Or… do I create the registration object first, then events, then go back and update the registrations and add the event association ?

I am using the Forms API to render HubSpot forms on my custom website. But when I use the Forms feature that redirects to another page on submission, nothing happens, despite the share-form functioning correctly.
These forms have been working correctly for a long time--this is a recent (like in the last few days) development.
